channel.title: microB on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in microB on Joone Blog

item.title: Performance test of the microB patches
item.description: I have tested the microB patches based on Mozilla1.9(Firefox3 alpha6 pre.) - The microB package contains more 200 patches and several patch sets. - It is released with Firefox3 alpha6 pre. now. Two kinds of test case are used. - Tinderbox DHTML Test - CSS Rendering Target Device : PAX320, RAM 256MB And I got the following results on TestGtkEmbed in Mozilla. * Tinderbox DHTML Test: The microB patched Mozilla is 2.
